casebody.data:
FOX, et al.
v.
JOHNSON, et al. No. 26P14-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Jan. 28, 2016. G. Gray Wilson, Winston-Salem, Attorney at Law, for Johnson, Mitchell, et al.

Stuart H. Russell, Winston-Salem, Attorney at Law.

Lorin J. Lapidus, Attorney at Law.

John C. Vermitsky, Winston-Salem, Attorney at Law, for Fox, William Thomas, et al. Matthew N. Leerberg, Raleigh, Attorney at Law, for N.C. Association of Defense Attorneys.

The following order has been entered on the conditional motion filed on the 12th of November 2015 by N.C. Association of Defense Attorneys for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of January 2016."

EDMUNDS and ERVIN, J. recused.
